mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_no lectureNo ,l.lecture_name lectureName ,s.survey_no surveyNo ,s.survey_title surveyTitle ,s.survey_content surveyContent ,s.survey_create_date surveyCreateDate ,s.survey_update_date surveyUpdateDate ,s.survey_startline_date surveyStartlineDate ,s.survey_deadline_date surveyDeadlineDate ,s.member_id memberId ,s.lecture_no FROM lecture AS l INNER JOIN survey AS s WHERE l.lecture_no = #{lectureNo} ORDER BY lecture_no

SELECT survey_question_list_no surveyQuestionListNo ,survey_question_list_name surveyQuestionListName ,survey_question_list_content surveyQuestionListContent ,survey_question_list_create_date surveyQuestionListCreateDate ,survey_question_list_update_date surveyQuestionListUpdateDate FROM survey_question_list ORDER BY survey_question_list_no LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT survey_question_list_no surveyQuestionListNo ,survey_question_list_name surveyQuestionListName ,survey_question_list_content surveyQuestionListContent FROM survey_question_list ORDER BY survey_question_list_no

SELECT survey_no surveyNo ,survey_title surveyTitle ,survey_content surveyContent ,survey_create_date surveyCreateDate ,survey_update_date surveyUpdateDate ,survey_startline_date surveyStartlineDate ,survey_deadline_date surveyDeadlineDate ,lecture_no lectureNo ,member_id memberId FROM survey ORDER BY survey_no

SELECT survey_no surveyNo ,survey_title surveyTitle ,survey_content surveyContent ,survey_create_date surveyCreateDate ,survey_update_date surveyUpdateDate ,survey_startline_date surveyStartlineDate ,survey_deadline_date surveyDeadlineDate ,lecture_no lectureNo ,member_id memberId FROM survey WHERE survey_no = #{surveyNo}

SELECT a.survey_question_no surveyQuestionNo ,a.survey_no surveyNo ,a.survey_question_list_no surveyQuestionListNo ,a.survey_question_content surveyQuestionContent ,a.survey_question_type surveyQuestionType ,a.survey_question_create_date surveyQuestionCreateDate ,a.survey_question_update_date surveyQuestionUpdateDate ,b.survey_question_list_name surveyQuestionListName ,b.survey_question_list_content surveyQuestionListContent ,b.survey_question_list_create_date surveyQuestionListCreateDate ,b.survey_question_list_update_date surveyQuestionListUpdateDate FROM survey_question AS a INNER JOIN survey_question_list AS b ON a.survey_question_list_no = b.survey_question_list_no WHERE a.survey_no = #{surveyNo} ORDER BY survey_question_no

SELECT sq.survey_question_list_no surveyQuestionListNo ,sq.survey_no surveyNo ,sq.survey_question_no surveyQuestionNo ,ql.survey_question_list_name surveyQuestionListName ,sm.member_id memberId ,sm.survey_answer_type surveyAnswerType ,group_concat(sm.survey_multiple_answer_content separator ', ') surveyMultipleAnswerContent FROM survey s INNER JOIN survey_question AS sq ON sq.survey_no = s.survey_no INNER JOIN survey_question_list AS ql ON sq.survey_question_list_no = ql.survey_question_list_no INner join survey_multiple_answer AS sm ON sm.survey_question_no = sq.survey_question_no AND sq.survey_no = sm.survey_no GROUP BY sq.survey_question_list_no;

SELECT sq.survey_question_list_no surveyQuestionListNo ,ss.survey_no surveyNo ,ss.survey_question_no surveyQuestionNo ,ql.survey_question_list_name surveyQuestionListName ,ss.member_id memberId ,ss.survey_answer_type surveyAnswerType ,group_concat(ss.survey_short_answer_content separator ', ') AS surveyShortAnswerContent FROM survey s INNER JOIN survey_question AS sq ON s.survey_no = sq.survey_no INNER JOIN survey_question_list AS ql ON sq.survey_question_list_no = ql.survey_question_list_no INNER JOIN survey_short_answer AS ss ON sq.survey_question_no = ss.survey_question_no AND sq.survey_no = ss.survey_no GROUP BY sq.survey_question_list_no

SELECT AVG(sma.survey_multiple_answer_content) surveyMultipleAnswerContent FROM survey s INNER JOIN survey_question AS sq ON sq.survey_no = s.survey_no INNER JOIN survey_question_list AS ql ON sq.survey_question_list_no = ql.survey_question_list_no INner join survey_multiple_answer AS sma ON sma.survey_question_no = sq.survey_question_no AND sq.survey_no = sma.survey_no GROUP BY ql.survey_question_list_no;

SELECT sma.survey_no surveyNo ,ql.survey_question_list_no ,sma.survey_question_no ,COUNT(CASE WHEN survey_multiple_answer_content = 1 THEN 1 END) surveyMultipleAnswerContent1 ,COUNT(CASE WHEN survey_multiple_answer_content = 2 THEN 1 END) surveyMultipleAnswerContent2 ,COUNT(CASE WHEN survey_multiple_answer_content = 3 THEN 1 END) surveyMultipleAnswerContent3 ,COUNT(CASE WHEN survey_multiple_answer_content = 4 THEN 1 END) surveyMultipleAnswerContent4 ,COUNT(CASE WHEN survey_multiple_answer_content = 5 THEN 1 END) surveyMultipleAnswerContent5 FROM survey s INNER JOIN survey_question AS sq ON sq.survey_no = s.survey_no INNER JOIN survey_question_list AS ql ON sq.survey_question_list_no = ql.survey_question_list_no INner join survey_multiple_answer AS sma ON sma.survey_question_no = sq.survey_question_no AND sq.survey_no = sma.survey_no GROUP BY ql.survey_question_list_no

SELECT ql.survey_question_list_no surveyQuestionListNo FROM survey_question_list AS ql INNER JOIN survey_question AS sq ON ql.survey_question_list_no = sq.survey_question_list_no WHERE sq.survey_question_type = '객관식'

SELECT survey_question_list_no surveyQuestionListNo ,survey_question_list_name surveyQuestionListName ,survey_question_list_content surveyQuestionListContent FROM survey_question_list WHERE survey_question_list_no = #{surveyQuestionListNo}
